nodes.text: Ogveer was a male Rodian smuggler that lived during the Galactic Civil War. He helped Uff Wogo get off Rori and took him to Dantooine. Boba Fett was hunting Wogo due to the high bounty on his head.

Ogveer appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
